text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I have some time on my hands, so I<n>head towards the track
to get a head<n>start on preparing for today's<n>training.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: S-s-stand up!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Mmm, no good at all... One more time!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Huuuh?! B-B-Big Brother?!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Huuuh?! B-B-Big Sister?!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Um, I-I'm sorry. I figured you<n>wouldn't come for a bit longer,
so I<n>was practicing!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ah, um... the class greeting.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: It's my turn tomorrow. So... Sigh.
choice_data_list: Do you not like being in charge of class duties?
Do you not like being in charge of class duties?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Huh? N-no! It's not like that.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I know I'm not the best person for<n>the job... but if it's for
my class, then I<n>always try my best.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I write our class journal all the way to<n>the margins... And I
keep the<n>chalkboard clean, even if it means I<n>have to
jump to reach the top.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: But... I'm really, really bad at the<n>class greeting...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
It's hard for me to speak up... And<n>when I get nervous, my
voice turns all<n>funny.
choice_data_list: If that's the case, I'll help you out.
If that's the case, I'll help you out.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: You will, Big Brother? You mean it?!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: You will, Big Sister? You mean it?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
We find an empty classroom to<n>practice Rice's class
greeting.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Deep breaths... Okay, here I go!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: S-s-s-stand up! B-bow! Swit dwown...<n>Eep?!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ah... I-I'm sho shorry. I bwit my<n>twongue!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Ugh... Sorry for being such a failure.<n>Even with you helping
me out...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Ugh... Sorry for being such a failure.<n>Even with you helping
me out...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: There's no hope for me...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Still...
choice_data_list: You don't want to give up, right?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Mhm... Exactly! I can't give up here!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I... may be hopeless, but that doesn't<n>mean I want to stay
like this!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: O-one more try. I'll nail it this time, Big<n>Brother!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: O-one more try. I'll nail it this time, Big<n>Sister!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I can do this... Yeah!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: The next day...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Stand up! Bow! Big Brother, thanks<n>so much for helping me
yesterday!
choice_data_list: I'm guessing your greeting went great?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Stand up! Bow! Big Sister, thanks so<n>much for helping me
yesterday!
choice_data_list: I'm guessing your greeting went great?
I'm guessing your greeting went great?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Uh-huh! Wow... When I'm with you, I<n>feel like I can change
myself for the<n>better, one step at a time.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Uh-huh! Wow... When I'm with you, I<n>feel like I can change
myself for the<n>better, one step at a time.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Haha, hehehe! I think I can go the<n>extra mile in today's
training!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Drip...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Eep?! That's cold! Wh-what th—

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Whaaaa?! But it was sunny just a<n>moment ago!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Ugh... it's all my fault. I'm the only<n>reason why it would
suddenly start<n>raining!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Waaah, I'm so sorryyyy!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I rush to comfort Rice Shower, whose<n>torrent of tears
threatens to rival<n>Mother Nature's own.
